name: The Great Treasure Escape
description: In this game you play as an adventurer who is trapped in and dungeon and must escape. However, there will be obstacles in your way. A death beam will follow you up the first level and kill you if you touch it. In the second level, you will face off against enemies that you must defeat with a weapon you get at the start of the level. To proceed through the game, you must get enough points to unlock the door at the end of each level. This is done by picking up jewels and defeating enemies.
